title: Minecraft正版启动器安装包
author: HC20011015
txt_content:
本帖最后由 huanghongxun 于 2015-2-3 22:21 编辑 

如果火星了请删,今天打开Minecraft.exe发现Minecraft正版启动器出安装包了,果断安装,今天给大家转过来;
本帖会持续更新Minecraft正版启动器最新消息和情况或者资源,如有忘记之时,还请各位提醒!
本贴只是更方便地提供Minecraft正版启动器的更新与使用,如有违反任何条例,删帖请随意!


.exe(即启动)转官网Minecraft启动器下载网址:3fe7

.msi(安装启动)转官网Minecraft启动器下载网址:c365

图:

官网的话:Download When you have bought the game, you can download the stand-alone launcher for Minecraft here. It will automatically update the game files with the latest version. You'll be able to play the game without an Internet connection if you've been online at least once. Show all platforms Multiplayer Server If you're running on Windows and just want to set up a server easily, download minecraft_server.1.8.1.exe and run it. If you want to run the server on any other OS or without GUI it's a bit more involved (see this wiki article for a tutorial). First make sure you can use java from the command line. On Linux and Mac OS X this should already be set up but on Windows you might have to tinker with the PATH environment variable. Download and run minecraft_server.1.8.1.jar with java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar minecraft_server.jar nogui.

Tip:本帖会持续更新,一般启动器会自动更新,如果无法自动更新可在此处下载!
    安装包启动应该会更方便...吧...这件事情只有晚餐骨知道
